title: Your account doesn't have permission to submit apps to the Store
body: When a corporate customer tries to submit app, an error message "Your account doesn't have permission to submit apps to the Store" displays and they cannot submit any app.

comments.body: Yup, had to contact microsoft, and then Smantec to get my company verified. So if you see this message ""Your account doesn't have permission to submit apps to the Store" and when you go to your account settings you see your Verification status in Pending then you have to contact symantec to get your account verified.
